register.reg_condition: when AArch32 is supported at any Exception level

purpose_text.para: Enables interrupt requests to be signaled based on the DCC status flags.

field_description.para: DCC interrupt request enable control for DTRRX. Enables a common COMMIRQ interrupt request to be signaled based on the DCC status flags.

field_value_description.para: No interrupt request generated by DTRRX.
Interrupt request will be generated on RXfull == 1.

field_description.para: If legacy COMMRX and COMMTX signals are implemented, then these are not affected by the value of this bit.
DCC interrupt request enable control for DTRTX. Enables a common COMMIRQ interrupt request to be signaled based on the DCC status flags.

field_value_description.para: No interrupt request generated by DTRTX.
Interrupt request will be generated on TXfull == 0.

field_description.para: If legacy COMMRX and COMMTX signals are implemented, then these are not affected by the value of this bit.

ps.name: MRC
MCR
